Uses of Class
dkeep.logic.Map

    • Uses of Map in dkeep.logic

      Subclasses of Map in dkeep.logic 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  Level1Map 
      class  Level2Map 
      Methods in dkeep.logic that return Map 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Map Level.getCurrentMap()
      Gets the Map that represents the current Level
      Methods in dkeep.logic with parameters of type Map 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean SuspiciousGuard.update(Map currentmap, char heromove)
      Updates the guard characteristic and then Updates the guard position by using his stored move set and checking if his characteristic is activated,in case that characteristic is important to the guard move turn
      boolean RookieGuard.update(Map currentmap, char heromove) 
      boolean Ogre.update(Map currentmap, char guardmove)
      Updates the ogre and club positions by randomly simulating new movements until the new positions are valid (a max of 50 tries in case something goes wrong) Only updates the ogre ( or tries to) if the ogre is not stunned
      boolean Guard.update(Map currentmap, char heromove)
      Updates the guard position by using his stored move set and checking if his characteristic is activated,in case that characteristic is important to the guard move turn
      boolean DrunkenGuard.update(Map currentmap, char heromove)
      Updates the guard characteristic and updates the Drunken symbol ('g') in case the characteristic is activated accordingly In case the characteristic is not activated the function updates the guard position by using his stored move set
      boolean Character.update(Map currentmap, char move)
      Verifies if the character is supposed to move,if such, the position of the character is changed
      boolean Hero.update(Map currentmap, char move, java.util.ArrayList<Character> enemies)
      Updates the Hero status and movement in the game by checking colisions with the enemies of the level, with the key and the door
      void Ogre.updateClub(Map currentmap)
      Updates the ogres club positions by randomly getting new adjacent positions to the ogre (after he moved) until the position is valid ( 50 tries atmost if something goes wrong) also updates the club symbol accordingly (in case it goes over a key, for example)
      Constructors in dkeep.logic with parameters of type Map 
      Constructor and Description
      DungeonLevel(Map mymap, int Guardtype)
      Creates a level of type DungeonLevel,setting the map that defines the level and the type of guard that appears in the level
      Level(Map currentmap, int Ogrenmb, int Guardtype)
      Constructs a Level, setting the current map and the other elements (Hero, Enemies - Ogres/Guard, Doors and key)
      OgreLevel(Map mymap)
      Creates a level of type OgreLevel, without any Ogres
      OgreLevel(Map mymap, int howmanyOgres)
      Creates a level of type OgreLevel, setting the map that defines the level and the number of enemies of type Ogre is in it
